A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved this movie! There were so many surprises in it\, so much going on in it\, that I am going to need to see it multiple times. It is a rich script\, with fantastic acting. Adam Driver continues to amaze me with his superb acting: he manages to show how Kylo Ren is just about ready to cross the line into crazy town\, completely unstable\, his anger is just about uncontrollable. And yet I can fully see the internal conflict he's having too. Brilliant.\n\nI am a fan of all these movies. I was a young boy when Return of the Jedi came out in theaters. I have been a Star Wars fan my whole life. These films are great\, and I can't wait to see what JJ Abrams does next\, and I can't wait to see what Rian Johnson does next.
